name: Asteroids (itch) (KhevanT)
description:
This is a version of Asteroids I made in September of 2020 as part of an online course.

It is not intended to be a complete or polished game. It is just a part of my journey of learning how to code! :D

The code repository for the same can be found:
https://github.com/KhevanT/asteroids

All the pixel art assets were made by me using Aseprite!
The sound effect assets used are under fair use license
